question: On which date, the 2019 edition of International Day for the Elimination of Violence against Women is observed?
explanation: The International Day for the Elimination of Violence Against Women is observed every year on 25th of November to raise awareness of the fact that women around the world are subject to rape, domestic violence and other forms of violence. The official theme for 2019 is \"Orange the World: Generation Equality Stands Against Rape\".
